Constipation

what is constipation?

Constipation occurs for many reasons, such as when stool moves too slowly through the colon. Slower digestion will lead to more feces becoming hard because the colon absorbs more water.

In some cases, constipation results from a blockage in the large intestine. If this occurs, quick medical care is required. It may also be a result of inadequate fiber or water.

Personalized Everything

There is No One Diet For Everyone

Vedas Cure Constipation treatment is one of the best treatments for Constipation in India. This treatment has already treated thousands of patients till now. Vedas Cure Constipation medicines are made up of herbal composition and are 100% natural.  Constipation medicines are Bowel & Consti care, and Gasto 21.

Vedas Cure Bowel & Consti care is a powerful combination of popularly known herbs that help provide digestive relief. It has Sanai Patra which is known for its carminative effects on the digestive system. It can be used as a laxative and is beneficial against constipation. Take 2-5gms of Constipation twice a day after meal with lukewarm water.

Why Vedas Cure Constipation Treatment is right for you?

Vedas Cure is a revolution in the field of medical science with a mission to provide the best ever possible health care services.
The name itself explains that the noble initiative has been blended with modern as well as traditional Ayurvedic treatment and approach to healing humankind.

Our key strength is our product formulation and selection of high-quality natural herbs to alleviate the disease in its entire extent. With over 40 years of experience in product development and formulation, we have cured thousands of patients suffering from many diseases in the most cost-effective, gentle, and natural way.

excerpt.rendered: Constipation what is constipation? Constipation occurs for many reasons, such as when stool moves too slowly through the colon. Slower digestion will lead to more feces becoming hard because the colon absorbs more water. In some cases, constipation results from a blockage in the large intestine. If this occurs, quick medical care is required. It […]
